Text: May I ask if you had upscaled the DVD?. Afaik there is not BR release of this show. Thanks!
Yeah I upscaled it.  It is definitely not a BR release.
Dude . .  128kbps audio ? *shakes his head*. Why upscale this so it's a 7Gb file and make the audio 128kbps? Sounds like total dog $hit. Thanks anyhow.
